title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 18, ch. II, subch. E, art. 3, pt. 512 - Drug Utilization Review
content:

State Regulations
§ 512.1 - Scope, purpose and definitions
§ 512.2 - Requirements for pharmacies

§ 512.4 - Use of prospective drug utilization review program data

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 18, ch. II, subch. E, art. 3, pt. 512

Statutory authority: Social Services Law, §§363, 364, 365-a

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
